mapper.select: select * from apartment_label al left join label_info li on al.label_id=li.id and li.type=1 and li.is_deleted=0 where al.apartment_id=#{id} and al.is_deleted=0
select li.id,li.name,li.type from room_label rl left join label_info li on rl.label_id=li.id and li.type=2 and li.is_deleted=0 where rl.is_deleted=0 and rl.room_id=#{id};
